meanings: (두렵다, 끔찍하다) (두렵다) scary, frightening, terrifying, fearful, (끔찍하다) terrible, horrible, dreadful, horrific, horrendous, (...

meanings.meaning: bore, scare, etc. the pants off somebody
scare, annoy, etc. the hell out of somebody
